content: DX 6-F10 Powder-actuated nailer Fully automatic powder-actuated nailer for single fasteners with 10 mm plastic washer ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Customized fastener guide – ideal for driving DS heavy-duty fasteners and 3/8 threaded studs Higher productivity – automatic piston return and cartridge advancement equip you to work up to 5 times faster than alternative fastening methods One-step energy level setting – expanded on-tool power adjustment means you can use a single cartridge color for many fastenings Easy to operate – precise control helps to deliver consistent, more accurate fastening On-board display – shows when your nailer needs cleaning or maintenance Applications Installing overhead sprinkler pipe suspensions using W10 threaded studs Fastening installation channels to steel and tough concrete using DS nails or W10 threaded studs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 18.7 x 2.7 x 7.5 in Weight: 7.6 lb. Fastener Intake: Single Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 18.7 x 2.7 x 7.5 in | Weight | 7.6 lb | Fastener Intake | Single | Fastener length range | 0.75 - 2.83 in | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | No | Power (max.) | 335 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-6-5-P10 ### ITEMS- 2229023 - Powder-actuated tool DX 6 F10 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 6_01 NFC Basic unit - 1x X-6-5-P10 Piston assy - 1x X-6-F10_01 Fastener guide assy - 1x X-6-SH Scaffold hook assy - 1x DX 6 Cleaning kit - 1x DX 6 XS Tool case
